results.name: Decimal expansion of average deviation of the total number of prime factors.
comment: Or, decimal expansion of constant B2 from the summatory function of the restricted divisor function.
reference: S. R. Finch, Mathematical Constants, Encyclopedia of Mathematics and its Applications, vol. 94, Cambridge University Press, pp. 94-98
J. Sandor, B. Crstici, Handbook of Number Theory II, p 155, Chapter V, 1) b).
link: Dimbinaina Ralaivaosaona, Faratiana Brice Razakarinoro, An explicit upper bound for Siegel zeros of imaginary quadratic fields, arXiv:2001.05782 [math.NT], 2020.
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Prime Factor
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Mertens Constant
mathematica: digits = 102; Mp = EulerGamma - NSum[PrimeZetaP[n]/n - PrimeZetaP[n], {n, 2, Infinity}, WorkingPrecision -> digits + 10, NSumTerms -> 3*digits]; RealDigits[Mp, 10, digits] // First (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Sep 02 2015 *)
results.author: _Eric W. Weisstein_, Sep 25 2003
